snippet: In a return to form, the South Korean electronics maker benefited from sales of smartphones, its recent Achilles’ heel.
abstract: Samsung reports fourth-quarter operating profit of 6.6 trillion won, or about $5.7 billion, compared with 6 trillion won in year-ago quarter; says first-quarter profit will rise roughly 10 percent from year-earlier quarter, largely due to sales of new Galaxy S7 smartphones.
lead_paragraph: In a return to form, the South Korean electronics maker benefited from sales of smartphones, its recent Achilles’ heel.

headline.main: Samsung Profits Are Up, Thanks to Its Galaxy 7 Smartphone
headline.print_headline: Samsung Profit Better Than Expected, Thanks to Its Galaxy 7 Phone
